attributes.action: To Build More Council Homes Across All Of The United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Council Homes across the UK are in short supply. If a War Torn Government of 1945 can embark on loads of Council Homes for the peoples of this Island back then. It's time to build build and build for the us that need it most today. With the sell off of housing stock in the last 20 years it's time to get new stock in and keep it in Government hands this time.
